info: generation, concentration and dissemination&nbsp of knowledge, competencies and technologies in response to global challenges related to demographic problems, increasing life expectancy, climate change, environmental pollution and energy security..
aboutKFU: KFU has almost 40 years of experience in teaching foreigners. Theuniversity is famous for its strong schools of mathematics, physics,biology, chemistry, linguistics. In scientific research, KFU givespriority to developments in pharmacology, biomedicine, geology,physics, chemistry, oil and gas, nano- and information technologies(IT), psychology and cultural studies, humanities, pedagogical andinterdisciplinary fields.
redirectText: Are you sure you want to proceed?
welcome_message: Dear first-year student, congratulations on the beginning of the school year.
account_creation_message: An account has been created for you to access the university's information resources. To log in to your student's personal account on the website https://kpfu.ru , use the login {{login}} and password {{password}} You can change your password in your personal account
yandex_instructions_title: In addition,an account in Yandex 360 has been created. In order to use this service, you need to do the following steps:
yandex_step_1: Go to the website https://ya.ru/ and add an account
yandex_step_2: In the LOGIN field you must enter {{login}}@kpfu.ru
yandex_step_3: Afterwards, you will be taken to the login page for the university's information ecosystem. On this page, you will need to enter the LOGIN and PASSWORD from your account specified above
myPracticeInfo: Here you can view the information about the practice

documentationForWork: Documentation for Work in KSU KFU
forDostup: To access electronic libraries outside the university, you need to set up a VPN connection to the KFU's internal network on your computer. The explanation is here.
title: Title
forTeachersinfo: Tools for tracking personal schedules, student attendance, and managing academic documentation
infoTextScdedule: Dear teacher! If there is no timetable or discrepancies are found between the displayed timetable and your actual timetable for the academic year you have determined, PLEASE CONTACT the DEAN's OFFICE of your institute or faculty to correct the identified errors.
infoTextBrs: Dear teachers, the PRS functionality allows you to enter the results of the current monitoring of students' academic performance during the semester on a monthly basis (the accounting month column can only be filled in during this month and five days of the following month).
infoTextBrs2: Dear teachers, before working with the 'PRS' tab, you need to go to the 'Schedule' tab and check that your dean's office has entered the schedule of your classes correctly
shortLinkInfo: Здесь вы можете создать короткие ссылки
verText2: A code has been sent to your email! Copy it and write it in the field below:
verText3: Time expired, please try again later
verErr: Please try again later, the next confirmation request will be available in 1 minute
infoTextVed: Dear Professors, the “Statements” functionality now includes the ability to download the exam and credit report. Please note that completing this report is available exclusively during the examination period
infoTextVed2: Dear Professors, before working with the “Statements” tab, please go to the “Schedule” tab and verify that your dean’s office has correctly entered the schedule of your classes
noSubjects: There is no data in the selected range
infoTextJournal: Dear Professors, the “Statements” functionality now includes the ability to download the exam and credit report. Please note that completing this report is available exclusively during the examination period
moduleDescription: The 'Student Practices' module is designed to automate the process of assigning students to practical training and also to control the completion of student practices, i.e., for creating and submitting reports for approval.
spravochnikDescription: Directories represent a 'bank of information' that is later used to form documents. The Register of Contracts is a 'bank of contracts' between KFU and organizations where KFU students can undergo practice. Information about these organizations is later used when forming the Representation in Order (RIO), Practice Order (PO), and Appendix 4 (A4).
registerContractsDescription: The principles of working in the 'Register of Contracts': all fields must be filled out, especially attaching documents (the contract file and additional agreements) - since if a student completes a practice at an organization with which a contract has not yet been signed or renewed, the practice will not be counted. To prevent such situations, these fields have been made mandatory.
individualTasksDescription: In the 'Individual Tasks' directory, there is a list of individual tasks for a specific specialty and type of practice. These tasks will be needed to create documents in the Student Personal Account.
practicalDescription: The Practice directory contains information about a specific (taking place during a certain period) practice, as well as individual tasks and competencies acquired during the completion of this practice.
formingDocumentsDescription: The tab represents tables for creating, editing, printing documents, and sending them for approval.
formingScheduleDescription: The Practice Schedule is a document that contains general information about practices for the entire department (without the names of students and teachers). The document represents the schedule of practices for the entire department for the academic year.
representationDescription: Representation in Order is a document containing information about specific students who are assigned to N practice in M period. It is necessary to separately fill in information about the organizations and the students undergoing practice in them during the M period.
practiceOrderDescription: Practice Order is a document containing information about specific students assigned to practice during a certain period. It is a logical continuation of the 'Representation in Order' tab.
appendixDescription: Appendix 4 is a document containing information about students being sent for practical training in a specialized organization.
finalCheckDescription: Final Check is a document containing information about students who have completed their practice and are awaiting verification.
rotateDeviceMessage: For this device, the module works only in landscape orientation. Please rotate your device.
onlyPdf: You can only upload PDF files!
fileSizeError: The file must be less than 5 MB!
errorTaskCount: The number of tasks must be between 1 and 10
emptyFieldDepartmentMessage: The 'Department' field must not be empty
statusSendingDean: Sending status to the dean's office
